verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: is] working to head off a confrontation with members of his own party on tariffs .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] is [V: working] [ARG1: to head off a confrontation with members of his own party on tariffs] .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] is working to [V: head] off [ARG1: a confrontation with members of his own party on tariffs] .
